title: How to Prepare Organic Pesticides   Year 2022

subtasks: Identify and collect necessary ingredients (aloe vera, red pepper, marigold, tomato leaves, onions).
Measure and prepare specific quantities (e.g., 1 cup red pepper, 5 cups marigold leaves, 7 onion bulbs, 1 kg tomato leaves).
Safely handle and process agricultural materials (chopping, pounding).
Combine prepared materials in a container (mortar, plastic container).
Add water (adjusting to desired volume; 10 liters for example).
Allow mixture to steep or decoct for 3 days to release active compounds.
Monitor decomposition and adjust as necessary (e.g., if the mixture becomes too concentrated, add more water).
Strain the mixture to remove solids.
Mix thoroughly and apply to crops as needed (spraying on leaves, stems).
Ensure proper application to target pests (caterpillars, aphids, ants).
